entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17 except 12 near Lake Superior. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. High 17 except 12 near Lake Superior. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
